languages.text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} from this weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}прицельный{/g} выстрел из этого оружия наносит {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g}, цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If deadeye shot, using this weapon, deals critical damage, it stuns the target for 1 turn.
If deadeye shot, using this weapon, deals critical damage, it stuns the target for 1 turn.

languages.text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}прицельный{/g} выстрел из этого оружия наносит {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g}, цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} from this weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Если прицельный выстрел из этого оружия наносит критический урон, цель оказывается оглушена на 1 ход.
Если прицельный выстрел из этого оружия наносит критический урон, цель оказывается оглушена на 1 ход.

languages.text: 当这把武器的{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}致命射击{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，会使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} from this weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当这把武器的{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}致命射击{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，会使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}轮{/g}。
当这把武器的{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}致命射击{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，会使目标眩晕一{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}轮{/g}。

languages.text: この武器を使用した{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}デッドアイショット{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}を与え、ターゲットを 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間気絶状態にする。
languages.original_text: If {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, using this weapon, deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, it stuns the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}デッドアイショット{/g}により{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルダメージ{/g}を与え、ターゲットを 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間気絶状態にする。

languages.text: Cuando un {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}disparo certero{/g} de esta arma inflige {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}, el objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} from this weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}disparo certero{/g} de esta arma inflige {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}, el objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

Si un {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}disparo certero{/g} realizado con esta arma causa {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}, el objetivo quedará aturdido durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn ein {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}treffsicherer Schuss{/g} über diese Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g} zufügt, wird das Ziel für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} betäubt.
languages.original_text: If {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, using this weapon, deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, it stuns the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye Shot{/g} über diese Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Schaden{/g} zufügt, wird das Ziel für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} betäubt.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Tir de précision{/g} décoché à l'aide de cette arme inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}, la cible est {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} from this weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Tir de précision{/g} décoché à l'aide de cette arme inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}, la cible est {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

Un {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}tir de précision{/g} effectué à l'aide de cette arme inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et étourdit la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
